definition: Danshui or Tanshui town in New Taipei City 新北市[Xin1 bei3 shi4], Taiwan
insipid/diluted/weak/mild/light in color/tasteless/indifferent/(variant of 氮[dan4]) nitrogen
surname Shui
water/river/liquid/beverage/additional charges or income/(of clothes) classifier for number of washes
to press down/to calm/to subdue/to suppress/to guard/garrison/small town/to cool or chill (food or drinks)

sentences.english: Most of the town Danshui is easily accessible on foot from the MRT station.
sentences.chinese: 淡水镇大部份地区步行十分方便。

sentences.english: Danshui Town, located in freshwater coast of Guangdong, long history and is famous hometown of overseas Chinese.
sentences.chinese: 淡水镇地处广东沿海，历史悠久，又是著名的侨乡。
